Quest looks fantastic. I'm currently learning the tool but I encounter issues with pictures.

I managed to display a picture one time, then it stop to work (I did not change the picture). I can just get a broken picture icon. I'm using the web version as I'm a mac user.

I tried to create a new game, using the script "picture" or using the picture frame feature, same issue... It displays a broken icon.

Did you change something on the server today?

Thanks for your help and sorry to post a topic for a so simple issue.

David
